line_1: I'm sure sma' pleasure it can gie,
line_2: Hear me, auld Hangie, for a wee,

line_1: I'm sure sma' pleasure it can gie,
line_2: An' let poor, damned bodies bee;

line_1: I'm sure sma' pleasure it can gie,
line_2: To skelp an' scaud poor dogs like me,

line_1: And to yon canty robin gie
line_2: Swith to my treasury, quoth he,
